title: Wav Player - 32playWavs
description:
WAV AUDIO PLAYER - 32PLAYWAVS

SHUFFLE , JOIN AND PLAY ANY NUMBER OF WAVS

LISTEN YOUR FAVOURITE ALBUNS IN SHUFFLED SEQUENCE ...

NOTES ( only wav audio type accepted)

put your wavs on the Wavsbackup folder and run the 32playWavs.exe
then click on the OpenWavsFolder button and copy your wavs on the
Backup folder to the put_your_wavs_here folder (already 6 chiptunes)
as example there that can be removed , all the wavs on the folder will get
a number during the shuffle and after that they will be joined quickly
and start on the player all happen in a click of the 32play button ,
if is wanted to stop the audio click at the stop image , otherwise just
let the shuffled wav sequence to go until finish all the wavs ...

wav shuffle, joiner and player ... all in 1 click and can be many wavs
you want that they will be shuffled then joined together and finally
played ...

enjoy ...



* 32play * 2015 * GLOBEPLUS FREEWARE TOOLS *
